title: APlusLift 4000LB Air Operated Sliding Bridge Jack ABJ-40
body_html:
All 4-Post Lifts and Jacks.

  • The ABJ-40 bridge jack will fit HW-8S, HW-8SXLT, HW-9KDP, and HW-4P10S car lift models.

  • Minimum Lifting Height 1/8" (See Diagram)

  • Two Adjustable Screw Pads and Two 4" Tall Truck Adapters Included

  • Long Arm Extensions: 27" - 62 3/8"

  • Adjustable Width to fit almost all service and storage lifts

APlusLift 4000LB air operated (ABJ-40) sliding bridge jacks are ideal complement to a 4-post storage lift. The jack can be used to lift front or rear side of a vehicle to perform wheel and brake services efficiently. The ABJ-40 sliding jack is equipped with telescoping support arms and adjustable screw pads for adjusting lifting height to accommodate most vehicles. Optional truck adapters (height extensions) are available if needed.

Free shipping to a commercial address (in a business zone) or a freight terminal. Residential address: +$70. Liftgate service: +$80. Additional freight charges may apply for remote areas and high cost delivery areas.

Warehouse Pickup Locations (Contact Us for $150 Discount): Charlotte (NC), Chicago (IL), Dallas (TX), Jacksonville (FL), Kansas City (MO), Las Vegas (NV), Mobile (AL), Mansfield (OH), Portland (OR), Tacoma (WA), Virginia Beach (VA), and Watsontown (PA).

Frequently Asked Product, Order, and Shipping Questions and Technical Questions

Specifications and Features

  • Model: ABJ-40
  • Installation Manual: ABJ-40 Manual
  • Operation Mode: Air Operated
  • Warranty: 1 Year (12 Months)
  • Type: Bridge Jack
  • Lifting Capacity: 4,000 LB
  • Overall Length: 33 7/8" - 45 5/8"
  • Distance Between Arm Pads: 27" - 62 3/8"
  • Overall Width: 18 1/8"
  • Lifting Height: 1/8" - 17 3/8"
  • Hydraulic Oil: 0.5 gallons of AW32
  • Air Requirement: 90-120 psi (ABJ-40 only)
  • shipping Weight: 300 LB
  • Shipping Dimensions: 40"L x 24"W x 11"H
  • Two Adjustable Screw Pads Included
  • Two 4" Tall Truck Adapters Included
  • The adjustable width of the jack makes it fit almost all service and storage lifts

    All 4-Post Lifts and Jacks.
